name: light-ball
effect: Held by Pikachu: Doubles the holder’s initial Attack and Special Attack.
short_effect: Doubles Pikachu’s Attack and Special Attack. Breed on Pikachu or Raichu: Pichu Egg will have Volt Tackle.
